Title: How can I make a route offline in Google Maps?

history.Text: Google maps recently added offline caching of maps. But I can only see a way to download a small area. If I'm going on a long road trip soon, is there any way I can tell it to download all the data for the navigational route between point A and point B?
How can I make a route offline in Google Maps?

Google maps recently added offline caching of maps. But I can only see a way to download a small area. If I'm going on a long road trip soon, is there any way I can tell it to download all the data for the navigational route between point A and point B?I'm looking for it to be used for Google Navigation for driving between the two points with turn-by-turn directions.
